law.catch_line: Power of turnpike authority to construct economic development road projects.
law.text: Subject to the provisions of KRS 175.640 to 175.690, the Turnpike Authority of Kentucky may initiate, plan, implement, acquire, construct and finance economic development road projects utilizing and employing all of the authority, rights and procedures granted to the authority by KRS 175.410 to 175.690, inclusive.
law.history: Created 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 393, sec. 3, effective July 15, 1980.
